'''Songs Amongst the Stones''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Songs Amongst the Stones is obtained as a reward for the [[Golden Life, From Yesteryear Awoken]] Hidden Exploration Objective.
